mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.template, p.note, p.createtime as createTime, p.createuser as createUser, p.updatetime as updateTime, p.updateuser as updateUser, p.type, p.delflag as delFlag, p.orgid as orgId from jy_scm_print_template p where p.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into jy_scm_print_template (id, name, template, note, createtime, createuser, type,delflag,orgid) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{template}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id as value,name as key from jy_scm_print_template where type=#{type} and delflag='1' order by createtime desc
